attributes.action: Award Knighthoods to all surviving members of the 1966 World cup winning squad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some of the World cup winning squad from 1966 have been honoured by Knighthoods, such as Bobby Charlton and Geoff Hurst. In light of the recent passing of Alan Ball, I submit the petition to honour all of the hero's of the 1966 world cup winning squad be honoured with Knighthoods to mark the greatest sporting achievement in our sporting history before any more pass away
